original_title: It Don't Cost Nothin' to Say Good Morning
overview: It Don't Cost Nothin' to Say Good Morning 1994 is an award winning documentary film directed by Kenny Hotz and Spencer Rice. The film is about the life of a homeless man, known only as "'Shorty' Gordy", who was a beloved but drunken, potty-mouthed panhandler, which was filmed over three years, covering Gordy's life and death. The movie premiered at Palm Springs Film Festival, Cin√©fest, the Worldwide Short Film Festival and won best short at the Hot Docs Film Festival.
title: It Don't Cost Nothin' to Say Good Morning
